conversation.content: [laugh loudly] Oh my god, yes! Remember when Jake tried to climb that fence and just—completely face-planted? [animated] That was the best night ever, seriously. We should do that again soon. [pause] Really soon. [cheerful] Hey, who needs another drink? I'm making my famous terrible margaritas that everyone pretends to like! [playful] Come on, Sarah, you know you want one. [warm] You guys are seriously the best, you know that? Like, I mean it. [sigh] Every single one of you idiots. [quickly] Okay, picture time! Everyone get in here—no, closer, we need everyone in this one. [excited] This is going in the, um... this is going in the memory books for sure. [very sincerely] I just want you all to know that these past few years have been— [laugh] God, listen to me getting all sentimental. [trailing off] It's just that sometimes you don't realize how good something is until... [speeding up] Never mind, who wants to do shots? [very loudly] Shots for everyone! [quietly] Because tonight is special. [happy] Tonight we're making memories that'll last forever, right? [pause] Even if forever looks different than we think.

subject: Being the life of the party while secretly knowing you're moving away and will never see these people again
